  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92789</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92789</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le prisme comme réflecteur</string>
            <string language="en">The prism as a reflector</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Prisma als Reflektor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O prisma como um refletor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il prisma come riflettore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρίσμα ως ανακλαστήρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El prisma como reflector</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme avec légende prouve que le prisme  disperse non seulement la lumière mais peut également renvoyer la lumière là d'où elle vient.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram with labelling shows that prism does not only disperse light.  Prism can also reflect light back to where it came from.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflecteur</string>
            <string language="en">reflector</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm mit dem Beschriften zeigt, daß 
Prisma nicht nur Licht zerstreut. Von Prisma kann auch 
reflektieren Licht zurück zu, wo es kam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama com etiquetar mostra que o prisma 
dispersa não somente a luz. O prisma pode também refletir a 
parte traseira da luz a onde veio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema con identificare indica che il 
prisma disperde non soltanto la luce. Il prisma può anche 
riflettere la luce di nuovo a dove è venuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα με το μαρκάρισμα δείχνει ότι το 
πρίσμα όχι μόνο διασκορπίζει το φως. Το πρίσμα μπορεί 
επίσης να απεικονίσει το φως πίσω όπου προήλθε από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama con el etiquetado muestra que el 
prisma dispersa no solamente la luz. El prisma puede también 
reflejar la luz de nuevo a donde vino.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refletor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρίσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανακλαστήρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflector</string>
          </keyword>
